Package com.olegtoropoff.petcareappointment.service.password

Interface IChangePasswordService

All Known Implementing Classes:
ChangePasswordService
public interface IChangePasswordService
Interface for the service handling user password changes. Provides a contract for validating and updating user passwords.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    changePassword(Long userId, ChangePasswordRequest request)
    Changes the password for the user with the specified ID.

  • Method Details

    • changePassword

      void changePassword(Long userId, ChangePasswordRequest request)
      Changes the password for the user with the specified ID.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user whose password is to be changed
      request - the ChangePasswordRequest containing:
      • Current password
      • New password
      • Confirmation of the new password
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if any validation of the request fails, such as:
      • The current password is incorrect
      • The new password does not meet security requirements
      • The new password and confirmation do not match
      ResourceNotFoundException - if the user with the specified ID does not exist
